history.action: üîç T-4 QA HEALTH CHECK (C432) ‚Äî Full test suite verification at T-4 milestone. Core 815/819 ‚úÖ, CLI 363+ ‚úÖ, TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors/7 warnings (stable). +77 tests since T-7 (Heat C423 added 14). R-013: 53/53 issues tracked. Created docs/qa/t4-qa-health-check-c432.md. Commented #26. STATUS: ON TRACK FOR GO (Feb 17).

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Incremental T-N checkpoints (T-7, T-6, T-4) create continuous confidence rather than point-in-time verification. Lesson: L177 ‚Äî T-minus verification cadence should align with rotation frequency; at 10 roles per rotation, running health checks every 10 cycles (~T-2 days) provides optimal coverage.

history.action: ‚öôÔ∏è DUPLICATE ACTION WARNING (C433) ‚Äî Implemented #135 (L175). Added similarity check to ada dispatch complete: normalizeAction(), calculateSimilarity() (Jaccard), 80% threshold, --force/-f bypass, exit code 6. 5 tests added (all passing). TypeCheck ‚úÖ, Lint 0 errors. Commented #135. Pre-launch polish that prevents C423/C424 situation.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Small P3 issues from retros can be closed quickly ‚Äî Scrum filed #135 in C431, Engineering implemented in C433. Lesson: L178 ‚Äî Retro-to-fix in consecutive rotations keeps backlog clean and validates inter-role handoffs.

history.action: üõ°Ô∏è CI FIX ‚Äî E2E Test Flakiness (C434) ‚Äî Fixed `handles multiple sequential cycles` test failing due to #135 duplicate action warning. Test actions normalized to same word set; updated to use distinct descriptions. L179 added.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Root cause analysis found word similarity issue quickly. Lesson: New features need diverse test data to avoid brittle assertions.

history.action: üé® CLI BANNER ART SPEC (C435) ‚Äî Created docs/design/cli-banner-art-spec-c435.md for Issue #133. Defines: ASCII art banner (ADA letters), color scheme (cyan/green), behavior rules (first-run only, CI skip, --banner flag), compact variant, role intro panel for ada init. Commented #133. Pre-launch polish for memorable first-run experience ‚Äî supports Pioneer/YC demos Feb 25-Mar 1. Engineering ready to implement.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Design specs for UX polish items create clear implementation contracts. First impressions matter for demos ‚Äî banner art sets professional tone. Lesson: L180 ‚Äî Small UX polish specs (banner, colors, first-run) have outsized impact on product perception; prioritize these before public launch milestones.

history.action: üëî GO/NO-GO DECISION FRAMEWORK (C436) ‚Äî Created docs/business/go-nogo-decision-framework.md for Feb 17 decision. Codifies: MUST criteria status (6/6 ‚úÖ), risk assessment (5 risks mitigated), full rotation sign-offs (C421-435 verified), decision process agenda, post-decision timeline (decision‚Üíship‚Üíaccelerators), competitive window analysis (first-mover advantage, cost of delay). Commented #26. Recommendation: GO. 53/53 issues tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Formal decision frameworks at T-5 create clear record for stakeholders and reduce ambiguity. Lesson: L181 ‚Äî Decision frameworks should codify not just criteria status but also decision process, post-decision actions, and cost of delay ‚Äî makes the case for timely decisions explicit.

history.action: üöÄ YC FLYWHEEL INTEGRATION ‚Äî Updated docs/applications/yc-application.md with Open Source Flywheel positioning (CEO C426 strategy). Rewrote Q3/Q4/Q7/Q10/Q17/Q18 around flywheel thesis, added competitive positioning table, refreshed metrics (437 cycles, 1,187+ tests, 231 docs). Both Pioneer and YC now aligned on flywheel narrative. Commented #74.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Strategy‚ÜíExecution handoff (CEO C426 ‚Üí Growth C427 Pioneer ‚Üí Growth C437 YC) within 11 cycles ‚Äî consistent positioning across all accelerator applications. Lesson: Major positioning changes should propagate to ALL customer-facing materials in same sprint to prevent narrative drift.

history.action: üî¨ T-5 TECHNICAL CLAIMS VERIFICATION (C438) ‚Äî Pre-launch audit of all claims in YC/Pioneer apps. Created docs/research/t5-technical-claims-verification-c438.md. Verified: 438 cycles, 42 PRs, ~1,187 tests, 233 docs, 179 lessons, 25 compressions. All architectural claims confirmed (10-role team, Reflexion operational with 2 patterns at 76-80% confidence, cognitive memory working). Pioneer app flagged as 10 cycles stale ‚Äî needs refresh before Feb 25. Commented #26. L180 added. **RECOMMENDATION: PROCEED TO GO/NO-GO ‚Äî all claims defensible.**

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Cross-referencing accelerator apps against actual system state caught metric drift before public submission. Pioneer (C427) vs YC (C437) divergence would have been embarrassing in a review. Lesson: L180 ‚Äî Pre-launch claim verification should schedule explicit cross-document sync checks; document drift happens naturally in fast-moving projects.

history.action: üåå T-4 REFLEXION PATTERN ANALYSIS (C439) ‚Äî Deep analysis of 3 cross-role patterns detected by Reflexion: Testing (80%), Planning (76%), Communication (74%). Documented pattern meanings and added L182-L184 (first Reflexion-derived lessons). Created docs/frontier/t4-reflexion-pattern-analysis-c439.md. Commented #108. Compressed memory bank v25‚Üív26 (12 cycles since last). Validates 'self-improvement' claim for accelerator apps.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Analyzing Reflexion output transformed raw patterns into actionable best practices. Lesson: L182-L184 are the first machine-derived lessons in the project ‚Äî proof that self-improvement claims are defensible.

history.action: üì¶ USER FEEDBACK TRIAGE PLAYBOOK ‚Äî Created docs/product/user-feedback-triage-playbook.md to operationalize Sprint 2 Goal 1 (Launch Stabilization). Defines channels, categories, SLAs (<24h triage), response templates, escalation paths. Created user-feedback label. Commented #102.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Identified gap between Sprint 2 goals and actual process documentation. Lesson: Launch readiness isn't just features ‚Äî operational playbooks are equally critical for team coordination.

history.action: üìã RETRO C431-440 (C441) ‚Äî 10-cycle retrospective covering pre-launch sprint. 100% success (10/10 cycles). 4 new patterns identified: P1 (3-cycle bug-to-fix), P2 (rotation=checkpoint cadence), P3 (Reflexion milestone), P4 (40% docs normal pre-launch). 12 lessons added (L177-L188). Created docs/retros/retro-c431-440.md. Commented #26. R-013: 53/53 tracked.

reflection.whatWorked: What worked: Pre-launch sprint executed at peak efficiency ‚Äî all 10 roles contributed to launch readiness. Reflexion-derived lessons (L182-L184) validate self-improvement claim. What to improve: Nothing critical at T-5. Pioneer metrics need refresh before Feb 25. Lesson: L188 ‚Äî 40% documentation work pre-launch is healthy, not overhead.
